attributes.action: Satisfy Nigel Farage's demand for second referendum if results between 48%-52%.
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage's public request, links below:

BBC:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-eu-referendum-36306681

Mirror:
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/nigel-farage-wants-second-referendum-7985017
attributes.background:
Nigel Farage publicly advocated for a second EU membership referendum in case the result of the referendum were narrower than a 48% - 52% range.

The referendum results are: 48.1% - 51.9%, which perfectly falls into the scope of Nigel Farage's public request.
